hero.subtitle: Developer | Script author | Open Source enthusiast
about.p1: I'm a passionate developer specializing in user scripts, web apps and bots. I work with JavaScript, Python and modern web technologies.
about.p2: I enjoy solving hard problems and creating tools that make users' lives easier. I contribute to open-source projects and share my work with the community.
project.yt.sub: User script to enhance YouTube: extra player settings, hotkeys and improved UI.
project.telegram.sub: User script to extend Telegram Web: extra features, privacy improvements and UI tweaks.
project.ytdl.sub: Web app for downloading YouTube videos with quality selection, playlist support and fast conversion.
project.myport.sub: Multi-purpose Telegram bot with async architecture for automation and user interaction.
skills.javascript.desc: Experience with modern ES6+, DOM manipulation, async programming (Promise, async/await) and building interactive web apps and user scripts.
skills.python.desc: Server-side development with Flask, Telegram bots, automation and data processing. Experience with asyncio for async development.
skills.htmlcss.desc: Semantic markup, responsive design, modern CSS3 (Flexbox, Grid, animations). Building beautiful accessible interfaces.
skills.typescript.desc: Typed JavaScript development, building scalable apps with better IDE support and fewer runtime errors.
skills.react.desc: Building modern single-page applications with React, state management, hooks and component-driven development.
skills.git.desc: Version control, branching, pull requests, code review and CI/CD integration. Experience collaborating in teams.
skills.api.desc: Working with REST APIs, integrating external services, developing and consuming APIs. Experience with Telegram Bot API and YouTube API.
skills.nodejs.desc: Server-side development with Node.js: building REST APIs, working with databases and the filesystem, and creating backend utilities.
contact.text: Interested in collaboration or have questions? I'm open to new opportunities and interesting projects!
